questions.text: What does Tom steal off of the table during his audition?
questions.explanation:
box of raisins.

	Tom Pepper auditioned for the role of Kramer, and eventually, he got the part.  George goes on through the whole episode trying to make Tom feel guilty for taking the raisins.

questions.text: What alias did Kramer use during his audition?
questions.explanation:
Martin Van Nostrand.

	The NBC representatives recognize Kramer from his Calvin Klein ads earlier in the season, but Jerry and George keep him around for the audition anyways.  He ends up stumbling on his lines a lot, and he has to leave to go to the bathroom during the audition.

proportions.

questions.text: What does Elaine wear to the pilot's taping?
questions.explanation:
Wig.

questions.text: Who jumps out of the audience during the pilot of the show?
questions.explanation:
Crazy Joe Davola.

	Crazy Joe Davola is angry with Jerry because Jerry caused Joe's pilot to be canceled.  Joe also happened to date Elaine for a short time, but she left him after realizing that he was obsessed with her.
